name: Spin (FloppaTheCaracal)
description:
every turn the player does gets you one point (points are useless by the way)

(the score in the top left keeps track of how many turns/spins Eggbert and Eggward did, also, they both turn/spin at the exact same time)

soooooo, I got bored, decided to make this idea since it came to me, you can play it if you want lol-

again, pressing "R" restarts the game and pressing "END" ends the game.
